Event_ID.description: A unique identifier for the consolidated event, derived after internal consolidation (e.g., a hash of Source_Event_IDs). Initially null until consolidation.

Source_Event_IDs.description: All original event IDs from various sources (e.g., GLIDE_number, GDACS event_id, Disaster Charter Activation ID). If only one source provides an ID, this array will have a single string.

Event_Name.description: Name of the event. Derived from source-specific fields (e.g., 'Disaster' for Disaster Charter, 'event_name' for GDACS, 'Event' for GLIDE).

Event_Type.description: Standardized event type (e.g., 'Flood', 'Earthquake'). Derived from source-specific fields (e.g., 'Type of Event' for Disaster Charter, 'event_type' for GDACS, 'Event_Code' for GLIDE).

Country.description: Country name. Derived from source data (e.g., 'Location of Event' for Disaster Charter, 'countries' for GDACS, 'Country' for GLIDE).

Country_Code.description: ISO3 country code. May not be provided directly by all sources. Could be derived from Country if needed.

Location.description: List of sub-national locations or admin areas. May come from 'Location' fields in GLIDE or Disaster Charter. If not provided, can be empty.

Latitude.description: Array of latitude values. Not always provided by all sources.

Longitude.description: Array of longitude values. Not always provided by all sources.

Date.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time string representing the start or main date of the event. Derived from source-specific fields (e.g., 'Date of Activation' for Disaster Charter, 'from_date' for GDACS, 'Date_' for GLIDE).

Year.description: Year extracted from the Date field. Some sources provide Year directly (e.g., Disaster Charter, GLIDE, GDACS).

Month.description: Month extracted from the Date. If not provided, can be derived from a provided ISO 8601 date.

Day.description: Day extracted from the Date. If not provided directly, can be derived from a provided ISO 8601 date.

Time.description: Time extracted from the Date. If a time field is provided (e.g., 'Time of Activation' for Disaster Charter), it can be stored here.

Severity.description: Severity of the event as an array of strings. If the source provides a numeric or coded severity (e.g., GDACS 'severity'), convert or store it as a string. If multiple sources provide different severities, all unique values may be included.

Population_Affected.description: Number of people affected by the event. Provided by some sources (e.g., GDACS 'population'). If not provided, leave null.

Fatalities.description: Number of fatalities caused by the event. If not provided by any source, leave null.

People_Displaced.description: Number of people displaced by the event. If not provided by any source, leave null.

Financial_Loss.description: Estimated financial loss due to the event. If not provided by any source, leave null.

Alert_Level.description: Alert level as an array of strings. For example, derived from GDACS 'alert_level'. If multiple sources differ, combine them uniquely.

Source.description: List of sources that contributed to this record (e.g., ['GDACS'], ['GLIDE'], ['Disaster Charter'], or a combination).

Comments.description: An array of comments or notes about the event, if provided.

External_Links.description: URLs or references to external resources (e.g., 'Details Link' from Disaster Charter).
